alert.note: Alert for Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southwest Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 03 at 10:09PM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in the lower elevations and 10 to 20 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Big Horn Basin and Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become difficult tonight and Tuesday morning. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility especially in the mountains.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southwest Big Horn Basin
